title: Mobile Escape Game for Bioterrorism Preparedness Education: Short-Intensive Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational public health knowledge and understanding of secondary education methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning game-based education conducted in mobile environments for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five steps of bioterrorism response procedures with 80% accuracy
Learners complete three team missions (4 members per group) within 30 minutes using a smartphone-based game interface
Learners propose two teachable strategies applicable to real educational settings based on in-game simulation cases

resources: Supplementary learning materials in PDF format
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
